The expert: s verdict states that three countries (Russia, Germany, and Italy) have conducted more combined testing for COVID-19 than the United States, contradicting President Trump's claim.
Data collected by Worldometer: a widely cited data aggregation website, shows that the U.S. has conducted almost 6.03 million tests, which is more than any single country but not more than all other countries combined.
The expert highlights that the U: S. trails many countries in terms of testing on a per-capita basis, indicating that the claim of being the best in the world on testing is inaccurate.
